title: S74 Colored Silk SGC Payne for Sale or Trade
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: S74 Colored Silk SGC Payne for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice S74 Colored silks of Fred Payne graded SGC 4 .Payne has the more desirable American league style with the criss cross bats, ball glove and catcher's mask beneath the player. I am open to trades of silks I don't have which could be tough to find. For trades I am looking for Colored silks with minimal fraying or White Silks with attached backs or other tobacco cards that might be of interest . If you are curious about S74 Silks check our [url]www.S74Silk.com[/url]

Payne sold
5.00 for shipping with tracking
bump on price drop. Cicotte sold.
price drop to 134.99 sale or trade value
